entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0169.10111] The parenthetical network 0000008 - Statement - Consolidated statement of cash flows (Parenthetical) contains calculations. The calculation uses the following concepts: ifrs-full:InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ing:TreasuryBillsAndOtherEligibleBills, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ing:IncludedInCashAndCashEquivalentsOfDepositsFromBanks, ifrs-full:CashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks, ifrs-full:InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ing:IncludedInCashAndCashEquivalentsOfLoansAndAdvancesToBanks, ing:NetInterestReceivedPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
These monetary concepts should not be defined in the parenthetical section of the filing and should be included in the statement calculation.
Rule Element Id:10111 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
